author: oppzy1
content:
Hey everyone,
I'm a Web3 Community Moderator & Community Manager with hands-on experience managing active Discord and Telegram communities for NFT, DeFi, and meme coin projects.

I specialize in:

Chat moderation (FUD control, spam handling, 24/7 support)

Onboarding & guiding new members

Boosting engagement through events, giveaways, and creative conversations

Staying on top of trends & helping communities grow organically

Hosting Twitter Spaces & running surveys to boost visibility and interaction


Payment is per week 

If you're looking for someone to grow, manage, and energize your Web3 community, feel free to DM me. I’m ready to contribute and bring real value to your project.

https://x.com/OpeyemiRighteo1?t=3AkZXNt1GlRPqELbXRtY2g&s=09

Let’s build something strong!
ㅤ

author: abcoathup
content: This Discord is for Eth R&D. It isn’t the place to look for community management work. Please post this elsewhere.
